str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I cast, throw, rush, (b) often, in the weaker sense: I place, put, drop. A primary verb; to throw.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
The abyss, unfathomable depth, an especially Jewish conception, the home of the dead and of evil spirits.  Depthless, i.e. 'abyss'.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To shut, shut up. A primary verb; to close.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To seal, set a seal upon. From sphragis; to stamp for security or preservation; by implication, to keep secret, to attest.
From epi and ano; up above, i.e. Over or on.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To lead astray, deceive, cause to wander. From plane; to roam.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.
As far as, up to, until, during. Or achris akh'-rece; akin to akron; until or up to.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A thousand. Plural of uncertain affinity; a thousand.
A year. Apparently a primary word; a year.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I end, finish, (b) I fulfill, accomplish, (c) I pay. From telos; to end, i.e. Complete, execute, conclude, discharge.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Third person singular active present of deo; also deon deh-on'; neuter active participle of the same; both used impersonally; it is Necessary.
A primary verb; to 'loosen'.
Little, small. Including the comparative mikroteros apparently a primary word; small (figuratively) dignity).
A space of time or interval; by extension, an individual opportunity; by implication, delay.
